entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 04:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
